title: Grade Card
content: Does the college issue a physical copy of ur marks sheet after each sem? Or are the results online itself and u can request a transcript if u want? I'm asking as we didn't get anything after first sem, so i just want to know.

comments.body: Yea, they will issue a physical copy of your grade card
Do u know When ? Is it after second sem or after backlog exams r over, given that they r happening rn ? When did u get urs ?
In every sem they will give previous sem's grade card
How do u get it ? Like do u collect it by urself or do u need ur parents to come as well ?
They will come to your class and they will give you
